mapper.select: select a.patient_num as patient_num, p_name, p_photo, review_num, a.doctor_num, review_content, review_rating, to_char(review_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as review_date, nvl(rating, 0) as ratingAvg from doc_review a, dl_user b, (select doctor_num, round(avg(review_rating),0) as rating from doc_review group by doctor_num) c where a.doctor_num=#{doctor_num} and a.PATIENT_NUM=b.PATIENT_NUM and a.DOCTOR_NUM=c.doctor_num order by review_date desc
mapper.update: update doc_review set review_content=#{review_content}, review_rating=#{review_rating} where review_num=#{review_num}
